SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bear
Abstract class representing a Bear.
BearController
BearController class manages the bear's state and actions.
Co
Represents a Polar Bear in the PoCoTo game.
GameController
GameController.java Manages the global game state and save/load functionalities.
GameplayScreen
GameplayScreen class represents the main gameplay screen of the application.
HelpScreen
 
HelpScreen.TestHelpApp
 
Inventory
The Inventory class tracks the items and their counts for a player in the Bear game.
InventoryScreen
The InventoryScreen class represents the UI and all the items placed in the inventory section
MiniGameScreen
 
MiniGameScreen.TestMiniGameApp
 
NotificationService
NotificationService class is responsible for monitoring the bear's status and updating the UI with appropriate notifications.
ParentalControl
The ParentalControl class is responsible for enforcing time-based limits on gameplay, tracking total playtime, session durations, and managing the revival of the bear.
ParentalControlScreen
The ParentalControlScreen class represents the parental control settings UI.
PauseMenu
PauseMenu.java Implements the Pause Menu UI with Resume, Save, and Main Menu buttons.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the Bear game.
Po
Represents a Panda Bear in the PoCoTo game.
PoCoToApp
PoCoToApp is the main application class for the PoCoTo game.
SaveLoadController
SaveLoadController class handles the saving and loading of Bear game data.
SettingsScreen
 
To
To class represents the Grizzly Bear type.
